ComicInfo.Summary:
The impossible will happen!
The stakes have never been higher going into the final massive story of Hell on Earth as the Black Flame tests the limits of his power.
Features a two page backup story "--Kill The Black Flame!" by Matt Strackbein, summarizing the history of the Black Flame up until this point.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Laurence Campbell | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Mike Mignola | 2 |
